init.title: The largest federation in Brazil: now modern
init.subtitle: CAFe 2.0 has arrived to revolutionize digital access between institutes and universities.

about.title: CAFe connects a network of more than 300 federated institutions.
about.p1: Maintained by RNP, the current CAFe operates the technological infrastructure that connects hundreds of Brazilian universities, institutes, and research centers.

p2.prefix: The proposal of CAFe 2.0 aims to modernize the current model through the
p2.suffix: protocol, expanding the reach of the federated network and increasing the quality of benefits for all parties.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Not yet. The launch is planned for 2027; you can sign up for our volunteer pool to participate in the beta testing program.
faq.q2: What are the criteria to participate?
faq.a2: We will soon publish the participation criteria.
faq.q3: How do I find the best benefits?
faq.a3: Through the Benefits Portal, you will be able to discover all available services.
faq.q4: Are the benefits valid throughout the country?
faq.a4: Yes, the benefits will be available to all federated institutions across Brazil.
faq.a5: We will soon provide dedicated support channels.

card1.title: Three platforms, one solution
card1.text: The adoption of the OpenID Federation protocol enables a flexible infrastructure with the creation of authentication, administrative management, and user-facing portals.
